publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8152 Mr Frank McAveety: Architecture Award for Shettleston Housing Association—That the Parliament congratulates the Shettleston Housing Association (SHA) on winning the Civic Trust Award for 2011 for its new office building; notes that this is the second design award that the building has won in recent months, following the Royal Incorporation of Architects in Scotland best building award in November 2010; considers that the recognition that these awards bestow on the building reflects the outstanding contribution that the SHA’s new offices make to the quality and appearance of the surrounding environment, and believes that this latest award is a tribute to the hard work of everyone involved in the design and upkeep of the building.
